Texto: 
none
multiple nodules and arcs of calcification are noted about the left knee, they appear to be within the joint space.
idiopathic synovial osteochondromatosis
• synovial osteochondromatosis
• hemochromatosis
• calcified tophaceous gout
62 y.o. man with long-standing left knee pain.
